name: Venti
quote: Perfect timing, Traveler! Tell me -- what is your greatest wish?
description: A bard that seems to have arrived on some unknown wind â€” sometimes sing songs as old as the hills, and other times sing poems fresh and new. Likes apples and lively places, but is not a fan of cheese or anything sticky. When using his Anemo power to control the wind, it often appears as feathers, as he's fond of that which appears light and breezy.
